title: A Code Switch Thanksgiving Feast
description: It's a Thanksgiving mashup episode! We speak to Lin-Manuel Miranda about Puerto Rico, a parenting expert about tense family gatherings, and a Native professor about the truth behind the holiday. And for desert, the debate of our time: pumpkin or sweet potato pie?
copyright: Copyright 2015-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
